Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 35 feet. You ignore the strength property of heavy armor.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: You Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution or Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Geonosians reach adulthood at 10 and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Geonosians' greedy and self-serving nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Crafter
Text: Geonosian culture promotes artisanry. You have proficiency in one set of artisan's implements of your choice.

Name: Exoskeleton
Text: You have a thick exoskeleton. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Flight
Text: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. While wearing medium or heavy armor, your flying speed is reduced by half.

Name: Geonosian Weaponry
Text: You have proficiency in blasters that deal sonic damage.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Geonosian. The Geonosian language consists of click consonants through use of a Geonosians' dual mandibles. This makes it difficult for other species to learn to speak it.

Name: Size
Text: Geonosians typically stand from 5 to 6 feet tall and rarely weigh more than 80 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Givin reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Givins believe power and respect are earned rather than expected, causing them to tend towards balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Hardened Exterior
Text: You have a tough, bony exterior. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Givin. Givin is characterized by its use of mathematical jargon and symbols, making it nigh incomprehensible to the less mathematically inclined.

Name: Mathematical Savants
Text: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check involving mathematics, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

Name: Size
Text: Givin typically stand around 6 feet tall and weigh 150 lb. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Stargazer
Text: You have proficiency in Piloting and Technology.

Name: Vacuum Sealed
Text: You can survive for one day within the vacuum of space. You still require oxygen to breathe. You have resistance to cold damage.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Adaptive Resilience
Text: Their innate understanding of technology allow gormak to readily adapt to its effects. You have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws against tech powers.

Name: Age
Text: Gormaks reach adulthood in their late teens and live for more than a century.

Name: Aggressive
Text: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

Name: Alignment
Text: Gormaks' warlike nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Claws
Text: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gormak. Gormak is primitive and gruff, often lacking definitions for things found outside of their homeworld.

Name: Size
Text: Gormaks typically stand 5 and a half to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Technological Affinity
Text: You have proficiency in the Technology skill, one vibroweapon and one blaster of your choice, and your choice of armstech's implements, biotech's implements, constructor's implements, mechanic's kits, or tinker's implements. Additionally, you have advantage on Intelligence (Technology) checks made to understand, utilize, or modify technology that you are unaware of or have never seen before.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Gotals reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Gotals' polite and respectful nature causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Energy Sensors
Text: Gotals perceive the environment around them through use of electromagnetic sensors held in their cranial horns. You have blindsight out to 30 feet. If another trait would grant you blindsight, the range is increased by half as many feet.

Name: Hunter
Text: You are proficient in Survival.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Antarian. The Antarian language is characterized by growls and clicking noises at various volumes.

Name: Natural Empathy
Text: Gotal's electromagnetic sensors allow them to sense the emotions in those around them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

Name: Size
Text: Gotals typically stand 6 to 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Gran reach adulthood around their late teens and live up to 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Gran highly organized society cause them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions..

Name: Keen Sight
Text: Through use of infrared vision, you have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Gran. It is rare to hear Gran spoken on any world other than Kinyen.

Name: Reader of Hearts
Text: Through identifying subtle variations in a target's body heat, the Gran are able to better understand their emotions and intentions. You are proficient in the Insight skill.

Name: Size
Text: Gran typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh around 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Slow Metabolism
Text: You are able to go a number of days without food equal to 3 + twice your Constitution modifier before suffering exhaustion.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Toughness
Text: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Half-humans gain the ability score increases of their non-human half, but they can choose any ability score for one of the options, instead of the given option. Half-humans can not increase the same ability score twice during character creation using this feature.

Name: Age
Text: Half-humans live around the average of the two species' lifespans.

Name: Alignment
Text: Half-humans tend towards their non-human half's alignment.

Name: Defiant
Text: Half-humans are known to be stubborn and often refuse to give up, even against the worst odds. When you or a creature you can see that can see and understand you makes an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can roll a d4 and add it to their roll (no action required). You can use this before or after the roll, but before the GM determines the roll's outcome. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, regardless of whether or not the non-human half can speak it, and the language(s) associated with your non-human half.

Name: Size
Text: Half-humans stand and weigh around the average of the two species' height and weight. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is the size of your non-human half.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is that of your non-human half.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength, Constitution, and Intelligence scores increase by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Harch reach adulthood at age 10 and can live up to 200 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Harch are cold, calculating beings, causing them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Bite
Text: Your fangs are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special bite attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn, and you can't use this feature again until you complete a short or long rest.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Harchese. Harchese is discernible from other insectoid languages by a noticeable emphasis on consonants, especially the "ch" sound.

Name: Six-Armed
Text: Harch have six arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

Name: Size
Text: Harch stand around 6 feet tall and weigh between 200 and 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Spider Climb
Text: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing, and while climbing you always have two hands free.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Herglic reach adulthood in their late teens and live up to 120 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Herglics' gentle nature causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Hold Breath
Text: You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour at a time.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Herglese. Herglese has a clear and commanding cadence, drawing the attention of those who hear it.

Name: Powerful Build
Text: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

Name: Size
Text: Herglic stand between 6 and 8 feet tall and weigh up to 600 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Technician
Text: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

Name: Toughness
Text: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Ho'din reach adulthood in their early 30s and live up to 120 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Ho'dins' benevolent nature causes them to tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Biological Specialists
Text: You have proficiency with Medicine or Survival (your choice).

Name: Cold Sensitivity
Text: You have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid exhaustion due to extreme cold.

Name: Crafters
Text: You have proficiency with one artisan's implements of your choice.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, and Ho'Din. Ho'Din consists of croaks and hisses. Its written form includes characters derived from the shapes of Moltok flora. The Ho'Din lexicon includes a great amount of plant-based idioms and metaphors.

Name: Naturalist
Text: You have proficiency in the Nature skill.

Name: Rain Forest Dweller
Text: Growing up in the rain forests of Moltok has left an impact. You don't treat forest terrain as difficult terrain.

Name: Reptilian Senses
Text: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check related to sensing heat, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill.

Name: Second Heart
Text: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Size
Text: Ho'din are taller than most species, typically standing 8 to 10 feet tall and generally weighing about 275 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Treeclimber
Text: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Houk reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Most houk are short-tempered and deceitful, causing them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Ambusher
Text: You have proficiency in the Stealth skill.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Houkese. Houkese is mainly formed by grunts, with subtle tonal inflections to differentiate words that would otherwise sound the same. Written Houkese uses primitive ideograms with one letter to represent each simple verb, and complex pictograms to represent nouns.

Name: Powerful Build
Text: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

Name: Size
Text: Houk typically stand 6 to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 300 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Surprise Attack
Text: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

Name: Toughness
Text: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and two other ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Hutts are considered a child until around the age of 200 in which they are a full fledged adult.  Hutts can live upwards of 900 years with even more ancient ones exceeding that.

Name: Alignment
Text: Hutts are selfish, greedy, and highly organized, causing them to tend toward chaotic dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Closed Mind
Text: Hutt brains have an unusual composition which made them resistant to influence from the Force. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Huttese. Hutts rarely speak Galactic Basic, even though they are perfectly able; if the person with whom they are speaking doesn't understand Huttese, they are more likely to use an interpretor than deign to speak the language of lesser species.

Name: Natural Resistance
Text: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage (explained in chapter 9).

Name: Powerful Build
Text: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

Name: Prehensile Tail
Text: You have supreme control over your tail and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

Name: Shrewd Demeanor
Text: You have proficiency in two Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma skills of your choice.

Name: Size
Text: Hutts have a unique special characteristic; from birth to death, they never stop growing. As an adolescent hutt, you typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh at least 400 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Slow and Lethargic
Text: Hutts are slow and generally incapable of moving quickly. You have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and when determining your bonus to AC from your Dexterity, you can't add more than +3.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 20 feet.

Name: Wealthy
Text: During character creation, you start with additional credits equal to your level x your proficiency bonus x 1,000 cr.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Iktotchi reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Iktotchi are lawful and tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Horns
Text: Your horns are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Iktotchese.

Name: Pilot
Text: You have proficiency in the Piloting skill.

Name: Precognition
Text: You can see brief fragments of the future, that allow you to turn failures into successes. When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Name: Size
Text: Iktotchi typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Telepathy
Text: You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet of you. You must share a language with the target in order to communicate in this way.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kage reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kages' rigid sense of honor causes them to tend toward lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Animal Handler
Text: You are proficient in Animal Handling.

Name: Athletic
Text: You have proficiency in the Athletics skill.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one language of your choice.

Name: Size
Text: Kage typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall, and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Strong-Legged
Text: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Text: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

Name: Superior Darkvision
Text: You've lived most of your life without direct sunlight. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Unarmed Combatant
Text: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

Name: Weapon Training
Text: Kage are adept warriors. You are proficient with the electroprod and electrostaff.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kaleesh reach adulthood in their early teens and live to be about 80.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kaleesh tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

Name: Darkvision
Text: The thermal pits under a Kaleesh's eyes grant darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Keen Smell
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kaleesh.

Name: Size
Text: Kaleesh typically stand about five and a half feet tall and weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Tracker
Text: You have proficiency in the Survival skill. Additionally, you are considered to have expertise in Wisdom (Survival) checks made to track a creature if that creature has a scent.

Name: Weapon Training
Text: Kaleesh are adept hunters. You are proficient with the blaster carbine, vibroblade, vibropike, and, vibrospear.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kallerans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kallerans' individualistic society causes them to tend towards chaotic alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Flexible
Text: You have advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks that involve flexibility.

Name: Keen Hearing
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kall. Kall depends upon distinct antenna movements communicate correctly. This leads to this characteristic antenna movement when kallerans speak Galactic Basic. Because antenna movement is an integral part of Kall, it is difficult for most other species to master.

Name: Prehensile Feet
Text: You have supreme control over your feet and can use them to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

Name: Size
Text: Kallerans typically stand 6 and a half to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Snap Senses
Text: Through your antenna, you can sense incoming danger and react accordingly. When you roll for initiative, you can choose to gain advantage on the roll. Alternatively, if you are surprised, you may act normally on your first turn. Once you've used this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2 and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kaminoans reach adulthood at 11 years old and live around 100 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kaminoans highly organized society lead individuals to tend toward a lawful alignment, though there are exceptions.

Name: Geneticist
Text: You have proficiency in the Medicine skill.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kaminoan. Kaminoan is characterized by its flowing water-like sound.

Name: Long-Limbed
Text: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

Name: Size
Text: Kaminoans typically stand 7 to 8 feet tall and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Tech Dabbler
Text: You know the *temporary boost* at-will tech power. Your techcasting ability is Intelligence. You do not require use of a wristpad for this power.

Name: Ultraviolet Sight
Text: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check related to sight, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kakarodon reach adulthood in their early teens and live to be about 70.

Name: Aggressive
Text: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

Name: Alignment
Text: Karkarodons' warmongering nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Bite
Text: Your sharp teeth are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special bite attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Karkaran. Karkaran is characterized by its fierce sounds.

Name: Size
Text: Karkarodons stand 5 to 7 feet tall and weigh upwards of 250 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom or Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kiffar reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kiffar are independent and free spirited, causing them to tend towards chaotic alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Iron Will
Text: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

Name: Kiffar Heritage
Text: A small percentage of the kiffar population are naturally Force-sensitive, able to read the memories contained within inanimate objects, while others train to become proud guardians of their home sector. You choose one of the following heritages:

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one extra language of your choice. Kiffar never had a tongue to call their own, using Galactic Basic as far back as their history goes.

Name: Nimble Reflexes
Text: Kiffar are naturally adapted to avoiding the Force. You have advantage on Dexterity and Intelligence saving throws against force powers.

Name: Size
Text: Kiffar vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Tribal Warrior
Text: You have proficiency with two vibroweapons of your choice.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Killiks reach adulthood in their 40s and live an average of 200 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Killiks' willingness to brainwash or kill their enemies cause them to tend towards the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Four-Armed
Text: Killiks have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

Name: Hardened Carapace
Text: While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Killik. You can understand spoken and written Galactic Basic, but your vocal cords do not allow you to speak it.

Name: Size
Text: Killiks stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Strong-Legged
Text: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Telepathy
Text: You can communicate telepathically with creatures within 30 feet of you. You must share a language with the target in order to communicate in this way.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength, Constitution, and Wisdom scores increase by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Klatooinians reach adulthood in their late teens and can live as long as 90 standard years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Klatooinian society encourages reverence for tradition and an inclination towards violence, causing them to tend toward lawful dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Enforcer
Text: You are proficient in the Intimidation skill. When you take the Help action to give an ally advantage on an Intimidation check, they gain a bonus to the roll equal to your proficiency bonus.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Klatooinian, and Huttese. Klatooinian is a gutteral, barking language, with many loanwords adopted from Huttese over the centuries.

Name: Size
Text: Klatooinians typically stand around 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Toughness
Text: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Name: Weapon Training
Text: Klatooinians are trained to fight from a young age. You have proficiency in two martial vibroweapons of your choice.

Name: Wisdom of the Elders
Text: You are proficient in the Lore skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kubaz reach adulthood in their early teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kubaz' courteous nature causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Art Obsession
Text: Whenever you make an ability check related to the acquisition or location of art or valuables, you are considered proficient in the check. If you would already be proficient, you instead have expertise.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Deft Hand
Text: You have proficiency in one of the following skills: Deception, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth.

Name: Keen Smell
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kubazian. Kubazian is comprised of a unique series of whirring, nasally syllables, causing Kubaz to have a high-pitched accent when speaking other languages.

Name: Size
Text: Kubaz typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and weigh around 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Slicer
Text: You have proficiency with the Technology skill and the slicer's kit.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Text: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kushibans reach adulthood at 13 and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kushibans' playful nature causes them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
Text: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Hide
Text: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. Additionally, your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kushiban. Kushiban has a bubbly, joyful tone to it.

Name: Mask of the Wild
Text: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

Name: Nimble Agility
Text: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

Name: Size
Text: Kushibans typically stand 3 and a half to 4 feet tall and weigh around 40 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Name: Stealthy
Text: You are proficient in the Stealth skill.

Name: Undersized
Text: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Kyuzo reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Kyuzos' belief in justice and honor cause them to tend toward lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

Name: Darkvision
Text: Your natural evolution allows you to see what others do not in dim and dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Foreign Biology
Text: Kyuzo struggle in atmospheres other than those of Phatrong. You wear a filter mask, and if your mask is removed while you are in such an environment, you lose consciousness.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Kyuzo. Kyuzo is characterized by short words and quick phrases. Kyuzo struggle with Galactic Basic as it is grammatically dissimilar to Kyuzo.

Name: Long-Limbed
Text: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

Name: Size
Text: Kyuzo typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 170 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Strong-Legged
Text: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Lanniks reach adulthood in their 100's and can live up to 900 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Despite the turbulence on their homeworld, Lanniks tend toward the light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Closed Mind
Text: Lanniks have a natural attunement for the Force, which makes them resistant to its powers. You have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against force powers.

Name: Force-Sensitive
Text: You know the *guidance* at-will force power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *valor* force power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *force enlightenment* force power once per day. Wisdom is your forcecasting ability for these powers.

Name: Keen Hearing
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lannik. Due to their large ears, the Lannik language is spoken softly, and it is considered insulting to shout.

Name: Size
Text: Lanniks typically stand 3 to 4 feet tall and rarely weigh more than 50 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Name: Undersized
Text: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

Name: Wisdom of the Elders
Text: You are proficient in the Lore skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Lasats reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Lasat' honorable tendences cause them to tend toward lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Bo-rifle Training
Text: You have proficiency with blaster rifles, bo-rifles, and vibrostaffs.

Name: Climbing
Text: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.

Name: Darkvision
Text: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lasat, a language whose *r*'s are difficult to replicate by most other species.

Name: Powerful Build
Text: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

Name: Size
Text: Lasats tower over other species, averaging 7 feet tall and weighing over 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Lurmen reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: The pacifistic nature of the lurmen causes them to be neutral light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lurmese. Lurmese is a name collectively given to the various tribal languages spoken by the lurmen people. While each language is distinct, shared phrases allow translation between dialects.

Name: Natural Healer
Text: You have proficiency in the Medicine and Nature skills, and the bioanalysis kit.

Name: Prehensile Tail and Feet
Text: You have supreme control over your tail and feet and can use them to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

Name: Rolling Agility
Text: As a lurmen, you can run on all fours, or curl into a ball, to move quickly along the ground. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

Name: Size
Text: Lurmen typically stand around 3 feet tall and generally weigh about 45 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Name: Treeclimber
Text: You have a climbing speed of 25 feet. You have advantage on Strength saving throws and Strength (Athletics) checks that involve climbing.

Name: Undersized
Text: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution increases by 2, and your Strength increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Massassi live relatively short lives. They reach adulthood after 14 years, and reach old age around 40 years of life.

Name: Alignment
Text: The massassi are savage and brutish warriors who relish on the violence of combat, usually following a dark and chaotic nature.

Name: Darkvision
Text: Your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can�t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Force Symbiosis
Text: When you reach 3rd level, you can cast your choice of the *curse*, *dun moch*, or *hex* force power once per day. Your forcecasting ability is Charisma.

Name: Hide
Text: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Sith. Sith is an agglutinative language, in which words or even phrases were made up of linear sequences of distinct meaningful units.

Name: Oversized
Text: Lightweapons and vibroweapons that lack the dexterity or light property are considered to have the heavy property for you. The strength number for blasters is reduced by one step (from 19 to 17, 17 to 15, 15 to 13, or 13 to 11). If the strength number is 11, you ignore it entirely.

Name: Powerful Build
Text: Your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift doubles. If it would already double, it instead triples.

Name: Size
Text: Massassi are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 200 and 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Type
Text: Your creature type is both aberration and humanoid.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Mikkian reach adulthood in their late teens and live a little over a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Mikkian's honor and integrity based culture causes them to tend toward lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Blindsight
Text: Mikkian can perceive the world around them through heat and radiation. You have blindsight out to 30 feet. If another trait would grant you blindsight, the range is increased by half as many feet.

Name: Bureaucratic
Text: You have proficiency with Persuasion or Intimidation (your choice).

Name: Keen Hearing
Text: Your head-tendrils provide a keen awareness of your surroundings. You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mikkian. Mikkian is a melodic, flowing tongue made up of several ancient dialects.

Name: Size
Text: Mikkian typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Miraluka reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Miraluka believe in balance and thus tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

Name: Force Sight
Text: Miraluka perceive the environment around them through use of the Force. You are constantly under the effects of the force power *force sight*, though the power does not require concentration for you.

Name: Force-Sensitive
Text: You know the *mind trick* at-will force power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *sanctuary* force power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *force confusion* power once per day. Wisdom or Charisma (your choice) is your forcecasting ability for these powers.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Miralukese.

Name: Size
Text: Miraluka typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Mirialan reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Mirialans spiritual tendencies cause them to tend towards the light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mirialan.

Name: Size
Text: Mirialan typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and weight 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

Name: Spiritual
Text: You have proficiency in Lore. Additionally, you are considered to have expertise in Intelligence (Lore) checks made to learn or recall something about a culture's religion.

Name: Surprise Attack
Text: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

Name: Unarmed Combatant
Text: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Strength or Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Mustafarians reach adulthood in their late teens and live about 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Mustafarians are usually judicious and value good work above all else, causing them to be lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

Name: Darkvision
Text: As an originally cave-dwelling species, your eyes are adapted to the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Hide
Text: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mustafarian. Mustafarian consists of choppy clicks and emphatic groans.

Name: Lava Dweller
Text: Your body is well accustomed to extreme heat, giving you resistance to fire damage. Additionally, your thick hide is naturally adapted to hot climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

Name: Refinery Specialist
Text: You have proficiency in your choice of constructor's implements, scavenging kit, or surveyor's implements. Additionally, whenever you make an Intelligence (Nature) check to identify a metal or mineral, you are considered to have expertise in the Nature skill.

Name: Size
Text: Mustafarians stand between 5 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 165 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet. You ignore the strength property of heavy armor.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Muuns reach adulthood in their late teens and live an average of a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Muuns' lawful culture nature causes them to tend toward lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

Name: Finance Savvy
Text: Muun share a keen business sense and an ability to find value where others don't. Whenever you make a Charisma (Persuasion) check involving finances you are considered to have expertise in the Persuasion skill.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Muun. The Muuns' admiration of mathematics carries over into their language, which bares a striking resemblance to Binary.

Name: Long-Limbed
Text: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

Name: Size
Text: Muuns typically stand 6 and a half to 7 feet tall and weigh around 200 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Three Hearts
Text: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Neimoidians reach adulthood in their 20s and live about 150 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Neimoidians' greedy nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
Text: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pak Pak. Pak Pak is often considered an elegant-sounding language by those who hear it. It consists of husky sighs and guttural ululations.

Name: Size
Text: Neimoidians typically stand around 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 135 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Smooth Talker
Text: You have proficiency in Deception and Persuasion.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Wealthy
Text: During character creation, you start with additional credits equal to your level x your proficiency bonus x 1,000 cr.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.

Name: Adaptation
Text: The frequent radiation bursts from the nearby dying star caused the nikto to mutate and adapt into different subspecies over time, specialized for different environments. Choose one of the following adaptations:

Name: Age
Text: Nikto reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Nikto's self-sufficient and clever nature causes them to tend toward balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Hide
Text: You have a thick hide. While you are unarmored or wearing light armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic, Nikto, and Huttese. Nikto is spoken with sharp syllables with a deep and rumbling cadence.

Name: Protective Membrane
Text: You have advantage on saving throws against being blinded.

Name: Radiation Resistant
Text: The dying star nearby their homeworld makes nikto naturally used to radiation. You have resistance to necrotic damage.

Name: Size
Text: Nikto typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Noghri reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Noghri's honorable society causes them to tend toward a lawful alignment, though there are exceptions.

Name: Hunter
Text: You are proficient in Survival and Stealth.

Name: Keen Smell
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Honorghran. Honorghran is characterized by its scratchy, gutteral sounds.

Name: Powerful Leap
Text: If you jump at least 10 feet in a straight line before hitting with a melee weapon attack, you can attempt to trip the target prone as part of the same attack. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Size
Text: Noghri typically stand about 5 feet tall and weigh around 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Strong-Legged
Text: When you make a long jump, you can cover a number of feet up to twice your Strength score. When you make a high jump, you can leap a number of feet up into the air equal to 3 + twice your Strength modifier.

Name: Unarmed Combatant
Text: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Nothoiin reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Nothoiins tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

Name: Born Pilots
Text: Nothoiins demonstrate seemingly innate piloting abilities from a very young age.  You have proficiency in the Piloting skill.

Name: Expert Navigators
Text: You are considered to have expertise in Wisdom (Survival) checks made to navigate.

Name: Galactic Traveler
Text: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

Name: Heightened Reflexes
Text: Whenever you make a Dexterity ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, you can choose to add 1d4 to the result. You can use this before or after the roll, but before the GM determines the roll's outcome. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and one language of your choice. You can also communicate via Notho, a native hand language developed by hunters living in the Nothoiin plains.  Usage of Notho is exceedingly rare outside Nothoiin culture.

Name: Major Miners
Text: Nothoiins have intimate knowledge of ur-diamond mining and refinement practices.  You gain proficiency in your choice of jeweler's implements, scavenging kit, or archaeologist kit.

Name: Size
Text: Nothoiins typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Starship Specialists
Text: Whenever you make an Intelligence (Technology) check related to starships, you are considered to have expertise in the Technology skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Ortolans are considered adults at the age of seven and typically live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Ortolans' love of food and music causes them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Foragers
Text: Whenever you make a Wisdom (Survival) check to forage for food you are considered to have expertise in the Survival skill.

Name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
Text: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Hide
Text: Your thick hide is naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide.

Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ortolan. Ortolan is characterized by its grunts and hoots.

Name: Musical
Text: You have proficiency in Performance and one musical instrument of your choice.

Name: Size
Text: Ortolans stand around 3 to 4 feet tall and weigh about 55 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Name: Undersized
Text: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Pa'lowick reach adulthood in their late teens and live about 75 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Pa'lowick enjoy a raucous good time, causing them to tend toward chaotic light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Hold Breath
Text: Pa'lowick have a great lung capacity and can hold their breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Lowickese. Lowickese requires the user to purse their lips and blow air, and is considered amusing by other species.

Name: Proud Performer
Text: Pa'lowick are best known for the energy they can bring to a singing performance. Whenever you make a Charisma (Performance) check involving singing, you are considered to have expertise in the Performance skill.

Name: Size
Text: Pa'lowick stand about 5 feet tall, and weigh approximately 100 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Snout
Text: You have supreme control over your snout and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands. Additionally, your snout is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage.

Name: Sonic Scream
Text: As an action, you can violently expel air in a 15-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). A creature takes 2d6 sonic damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to 4d6 at 5th level, 6d6 at 11th level, and 8d6 at 17th level. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence or Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Pantorans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Pantorans' interest in politics causes them to tend towards lawful alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Cold Adaptation
Text: You have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid exhaustion due to extreme cold.

Name: Cultured
Text: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

Name: Impose Order
Text: As a bonus action, you can command each ally within 15 feet of you to move up to half that ally's speed as a reaction. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Once you use this trait, you can�t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pantoran. Pantoran comprises many dialects that prevent clear communication, a vestige of the feudal culture of the planet's past. Because of the difficulties of operating a planetary government with so many different languages, the Assembly established Galactic Basic as the official language of their people as a means of unifying the planet.

Name: Negotiators
Text: You have advantage on Charisma (Persuasion) checks meant to negotiate terms or agreements between parties.

Name: Organized
Text: Your society values organization, and as such you are good at making good use of the space provided. When you are in charge of packing a space, such as a vehicle or cargo hold, that space's carrying capacity is increased by one-fourth its base capacity.

Name: Political Guile
Text: You are proficient in Persuasion or Deception (your choice).

Name: Size
Text: Pantorans typically stand 5 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Patrolians reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Patrolians' greedy, scheming nature causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Conniving
Text: You have proficiency in Deception or Stealth (your choice).

Name: Darkvision
Text: Accustomed to life underwater, you have superior vision in low light conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Electrical Resistance
Text: Patrolians are notably capable of shrugging off electricity. You have resistance to lightning damage.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Patrolian. Patrolian is a high-energy language, consisting mostly of gurgles and skittish vocalizations. Patrolian, even when spoken on land, sounds like it's being spoken underwater.

Name: Size
Text: Patrolians typically stand just over 3 feet tall and generally weigh about 40 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Small.

Name: Specialist
Text: You have proficiency in one specialist's kit of your choice.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 25 feet.

Name: Technician
Text: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

Name: Undersized
Text: Your small stature makes it hard for you to wield bigger weapons. You can't use heavy shields. Additionally, you can't use martial weapons with the two-handed property unless it also has the light property, and if a martial weapon has the versatile property, you can only wield it in two hands.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Pau'ans reach adulthood in their 30's and have been known to live up to 700 years old.

Name: Alignment
Text: Pau'ans' commanding presence, yet friendly and kind nature, cause them to tend to be lawful light side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Authoritative
Text: You have proficiency in Persuasion or Intimidation (your choice).

Name: Cultured
Text: You have proficiency in the Lore skill.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Hypersensitive Hearing
Text: Pau'ans possess incredibly receptive hearing, often to their detriment, so you wear special covers on your ears. Whenever you make a Wisdom (Perception) check involving hearing, you are considered to have expertise in the Perception skill, but if your hearing aids are removed, you have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that would deal sonic damage.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Utapese. Utapese is characterized by its rigid, yet melodic sound.

Name: Size
Text: Pau'ans typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 150 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Vigilant
Text: You can choose to have advantage on your next Initiative check. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Pykes reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Due to their underhanded nature, Pykes tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Pyke. The Pyke language is characterized by its multisyllable grunts.

Name: Long-Limbed
Text: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

Name: Mercantile
Text: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: Deception, Persuasion, or Intimidation.

Name: Notorious Slavers
Text: Whenever you make an ability check related to the buying, selling, or controlling of slaves, you are considered proficient in the check. If you would already be proficient, you instead have expertise.

Name: Size
Text: Pykes typically stand 6 to 6 and a half feet tall and generally weigh about 155 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Spicer
Text: You are proficient in spicer's kit.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Constitution score increases by 2, and your Wisdom score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Quarren reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Quarren desire for equal rights causes them to tend toward balanced, though there are exceptions.

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Climb
Text: You have a climbing speed of 30 feet.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Ink Cloud
Text: As an action, you can expel ink in a 10-foot cone. When you do so, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, a creature is blinded until the end of its next turn. This ability has no effect on constructs. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you complete a long rest.

Name: Keen Hearing
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Quarrenese. The Quarrenese language is characterized by its garbled nature that evokes an image of speaking underwater.

Name: Size
Text: Quarren typically stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh about 160 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Quermians reach adulthood in their early teens and live a little under a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Querians philosophic culture causes them to tend toward light alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Diplomatic
Text: You have proficiency with Insight or Persuasion (your choice).

Name: Four-Armed
Text: Quermians have four arms which they can use independently of one another. You can only gain the benefit of items held by two of your arms at any given time, and once per round you can switch which arms you are benefiting from (no action required).

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Quermian. You can also communicate with other quermians more effectively through a thorough understanding of body language that xenobiologists widely attribute to latent telepathy.

Name: Natural Empathy
Text: Quermians' talent at reading the body language of others allow them to sense the emotions in those around them. You have advantage on Wisdom (Insight) checks to determine emotions against humanoids and beasts within 10 feet of you.

Name: Size
Text: Quermians typically stand 7 to 8 feet tall and generally weigh about 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Two Brains
Text: When you make a Wisdom saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the roll. Once you've done so, you must complete a short or long rest before you can do so again.

Name: Watchful
Text: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Adaptive Resilience
Text: Prolongued use of technology allows rakata to readily adapt to its effects. You have advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws against tech powers.

Name: Age
Text: Rakata reach adulthoood by 20 and rarely live longer than 90 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Rakata's propensity towards war and aggression cause them to tend toward lawful dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Cannibalize
Text: If you spend at least 1 minute devouring the corpse of a beast or humanoid, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. Once you've used this feature, you must complete a short or long rest before you can use it again.

Name: Claws
Text: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Force-Insensitive
Text: While rakata can be manipulated by many force powers, they can not sense the Force. You can not use force powers or take levels in forcecasting classes.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rakata. Rakata is characterized by its deep tones and simplistic nature, using mainly consonants and long vowels. It's script seems to be a very ancient form of Galactic Basic.

Name: Size
Text: Rakata typically stand between 6 and 7 feet tall and weigh around 180 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Technician
Text: You are proficient in the Technology skill.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Wisdom score increases by 2, and your Dexterity or Intelligence score increases by 1.

Name: Acrobatic
Text: You have proficiency in Acrobatics.

Name: Age
Text: Rattataki reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Rattataki are self-serving and violent which causes them to tend toward the dark side, though there are exceptions.

Name: Intimidating
Text: You have proficiency in Intimidation.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rattataki. Rattataki is known for have an inordinate amount of curses.

Name: Size
Text: Rattataki typically stand about 5 and a half feet tall and weigh 140 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

Name: Surprise Attack
Text: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

Name: Unarmed Combatant
Text: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Rishii reach adulthood at 10 and generally live no longer than 60 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Rishii tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

Name: Flight
Text: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. While wearing medium or heavy armor, your flying speed is reduced by half.

Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Rishii. Rishii's clicks, trills, and whistles are difficult for outsiders to learn without the aid of a protocol droid, and so Rishii often feel comfortable speaking to eachother in the language in front of others.

Name: Mimicry
Text: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check opposed by your Charisma (Deception) check.

Name: Size
Text: Rishii range from 4 to 6 feet tall and generally weigh less than 130 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Ryn reach adulthood in their early teens and live about 80 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Ryn's superstitious and solitary nature causes them to tend toward balanced alignments, though there are exceptions.

Name: Con Artist
Text: You have proficiency in one gaming set of your choice.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Divination
Text: Whether through mystical divination or sheer luck, you can turn failures into successes. When you roll a 1 on the d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Name: Eternal Nomads
Text: You have proficiency in Lore or Survival (your choice).

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Ryn. Ryn uses tones and inflections and is easily described as melodious by anyone who hears it. You can communicate with droids and other ryn without using words through the use of your beak.

Name: Musical
Text: You have proficiency in Performance and one musical instrument of your choice.

Name: Prehensile Tail
Text: You have supreme control over your tail and can use it to manipulate objects as well as your hands.

Name: Size
Text: Ryn typically stand 4 and a half to 6 feet tall and generally weigh about 120 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Intelligence score increases by 2, and your Charisma score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Selkath reach adulthood in their late teens and live up to 100 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Selkath have been renowned for countless millenia of the careful preservation of neutrality. As such individuals tend towards the neutral balanced alignment, though there are exceptions.

Name: Amphibious
Text: You can breathe air and water.

Name: Claws
Text: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d4 kinetic damage and have the finesse property. Lastly, as a bonus action, you can perform a special claw attack. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC = 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target is poisoned until the end of its next turn, and you can't use this feature again until you complete a short or long rest.

Name: Gift of the Progenitor
Text: You know the *temporary boost* at-will tech power. When you reach 3rd level, you learn and can cast the *kolto pack* tech power once per day. When you reach 5th level, you learn and can cast the *kolto cloud* tech power once per day. Your techcasting ability is Intelligence. You do not require use of a wristpad for these powers.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Selkatha. Selkatha has a very moist and gurgling tone to it.

Name: Size
Text: Selkath typically stand between 4 and a half to 5 and a half feet tall and average 130 pounds. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and your Strength score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Selonians reach adulthood in their mid teens and live for about 75 years.

Name: Alignment
Text: Selonians are serious and den-focused, causing them to tend towards lawful balanced, though there are exceptions.

Name: Climb
Text: You have a climbing speed of 35 feet.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You have a keen eyesight, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can�t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Mandaba. Selonians use the name "Home Talk" to refer to their own language.

Name: Nimble Agility
Text: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the tum. Once you use this trait, you can�t use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

Name: Size
Text: Selonians typically stand 6 to 7 feet tall and generally weigh about 180 lbs. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Name: Speed
Text: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

Name: Swim
Text: You have a swimming speed of 35 feet.

Name: Tail and Claw
Text: Your strong tail and razor-sharp claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. Additionally, your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 kinetic damage.

Name: Ability Score Increase
Text: Your Strength score increases by 2, and your Constitution score increases by 1.

Name: Age
Text: Shistavanen reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Name: Alignment
Text: Shistavanen are private and tend toward no particular alignment. The best and worst are found among them.

Name: Darkvision
Text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Name: Forced March
Text: Shistavanen are able to maintain a fast pace longer than other species. Shistavanen have advantage on Constitution saving throws made to avoid Exhaustion due to prolongued travel, as described in Chapter 8.

Name: Keen Hearing and Smell
Text: You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that involve hearing or smell.

Name: Languages
Text: You can speak, read, and write Galactic Basic and Shistavanen. The Shistavanen language is characterized by its barks and growls.

Name: Regenerative
Text: When you take damage, you can use your reaction and expend a Hit Die to regain hit points as long as the damage would not reduce your hit points to 0.

Name: Size
